headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Price Target Cut as Barclays Adjusts Outlook after Results
summary: Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) is included among the 14 Best Real Estate Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On February 17, Barclays analyst Brendan Lynch lowered his price recommendation on Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) to $91 from $101. The analyst reiterated an Equal Weight rating on the stock. The update came after the company’s […]
